alert.note: Alert for Baca (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 10:03PM MDT until June 07 at 10:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BACA COUNTY... At 1002 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stonington, or 10 miles south of The Saunders Elevator, moving southeast at 30 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR NORTHEAST BACA COUNTY. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Baca County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
